articles.author: Edmund Lee
articles.title: Politico to Be Acquired by Axel Springer, a German Publisher - The New York Times
articles.description: The publishing giant will take control of Politico, Politico Europe and Politico’s tech news site, Protocol. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
articles.content:
Politico, the Washington news site that has prospered for years as Beltway professionals gobbled up its scoops and inside-baseball style reporting, will have a new owner.

articles.description: French leader greeted at Áras an Uachtaráin by President Michael D. Higgins and Sabina
articles.content:
Emmanuel Macron has been welcomed to Ireland by President Michael D. Higgins on his first official visit to the State.
